dict.acceptation: 概念，观念；意见，见解；奇想；打算；

sent.orig: So, people oriented is not only a notion of axiology but also a notion of historic.
sent.trans: 因此，“以人为本”既是一个价值观命题，也是一个历史观命题。

sent.orig: The reason is that an outmoded and conservative notion is doing mischief in their minds.
sent.trans: 这是一种陈旧的保守的观点在这些同志的头脑中作怪的缘故。

sent.orig: One common notion is that red hair means a quick temper.
sent.trans: 一般的概念是红发表示脾气急躁。

sent.orig: "Now then, drop that notion out of your mind, and don't ever meddle with it again.
sent.trans: “别瞎出主意了，也别再添乱了。

sent.orig: For us now this notion is rather obscure and faded.
sent.trans: 对我们而言，这个观念现在相当模糊暗淡。
